service_figures: INT has extensive experience in delivering data intelligence and analytics solutions across various industries. The company has successfully implemented enterprise data warehouses, centralized data architectures, and business intelligence platforms that have significantly improved decision-making processes for clients. For instance, INT helped Biocon reduce decision-making time by 70% and cut operational costs by 80% through automation and real-time data access. Additionally, INT has integrated over 80 data sources and created more than 120 business intelligence platforms, demonstrating its capability to handle complex data environments and deliver actionable insights.
